measurements.description: An attractive 17-ft x 5-ft rectangular, multi-tiered table and floor display with background lighting along the entire length; accents for Masquerade theme interspersed with many specimen-sized plants of a wide variety of genera; color flowed from cool to neutral to warm, left to right; flowers from over 70 plants including Dendrobium, Cattleya, Cymbidium, Paphiopedilum; Miltonia, and Leptotes; also received the Show Trophy, #20225414.
